content:
We hereby share a translation to Russian that we have seen on Communist International of the call by the ICL “COMRADE LENIN, LEADING LIGHT OF THE INTERNATIONAL PROLETARIAT AND GREAT TEACHER OF MARXISM-LENINISM-MAOISM, ILLUMINATES THE PATH OF UNITY FOR THE INTERNATIONAL COMMUNIST MOVEMENT”

RUS_-Lenin-ICL-statementDownload
title: Russian: Statement of the ICL on Comrade Lenin – The Red Herald
description: We hereby share a translation to Russian that we have seen on Communist International of the call by the ICL “COMRADE LENIN, LEADING LIGHT OF THE INTERNATIONAL PROLETARIAT AND GREAT TEACHER OF MARXISM-LENINISM-MAOISM, ILLUMINATES THE PATH OF UNITY FOR THE INTERNATIONAL COMMUNIST MOVEMENT”
author: F.W.
